Why Attend?

  • Learn! Watch presentations with content curated from around the southwest region on the latest and greatest Epic EMR innovations.

  • Meet! Network with local EMR professionals working on cutting-edge build and programs that are being implemented in our region.

  • Engage! Meet SWUGM's sponsors and lean about their products and services.

  • Eat! Enjoy a complimentary light breakfast and lunch with your team and new friends you make at SWUGM.

    • Your To-Do List

    1. Submit your Presentation (Start: August 27th, Due: Jan 25th 2019)

    2. Book your hotel (Book ASAP as rooms fill up quickly this time of year)

    3. Register for SWUGM19 - Space is limited register early! (Available: February 7th, Due: March 15th 2019) (COMING SOON)

    4. Create your schedule (Available: Feb 14th, Due: March 8th 2019) (COMING SOON)

    5. Print your schedule (Available: March 25th, 2019) (COMING SOON)

    Connect With Us

  • Tag your posts with #SWUGM19

  • Join Our Epic Community Page
